ComicInfo.Summary:
After a year of buildup, the Day of Chaos has finally arrived for Judge Dredd and what's left of Mega-City One. This progs target? The Academy of Law.
Cover: Jon Davis-Hunt (Judge Dredd)
Judge Dredd - Chaos Day (part 1) (John Wagner - Henry Flint)Durham Red - The 'Nobody Wants This Job' Job (part 3) (Alan Grant - Carlos Ezquerra)Nikolai Dante - Sympathy for the Devil (part 2) (Robbie Morrison - Simon Fraser)Tharg's Future Shocks - Silent Running (David Baillie - Anthony Williams)Grey Area - One of Our Own (part 3) (Dan Abnett - Lee Carter)
